short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create digital evidence from Social Media/Web content with a single click. WebPreserver.com - Browse, Click, Evidence.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You need a paid WebPreserver subscription to use this extension.

WebPreserver is a browser Extension for law firms and legal investigators to capture webpages, social media pages, videos and even complete websites in evidentiary quality. The collections can be exported to PDF, MHTML and WARC including a collection report.

New in version 2.1.6:

-- WebPreserver's latest release brings an exciting new update! A new config option will allow you to "Overlap Content" in PDF exports, ensuring that no content is lost across pages.


New in version 2.1.5.7:

-- Fixes for Facebook Bulk Captures and issues with some sticky headers persisting on captures for LinkedIn and Youtube.


New in version 2.1.5.6:

-- Fixes for Facebook Bulk Captures and expanding comments on Twitter.


New in version 2.1.5.4:

-- Changes in Collection Report and PDF export configs now apply to exports of collections made before the config changes! 


New in version 2.1.5.3:

-- Bug fixes and minor enhancements.


New in version 2.1.5.2:

-- Fix for issue with expanding LinkedIn comments.


New in version 2.1.5:

Lots of new features and enhancements with our latest release!

-- Apply date range filters before performing Facebook bulk captures.
-- Bulk captures will now be automatically captured within folders, making it easier to navigate through your dashboard and export your captures in bulk from within these folders!
-- A new “Paper Size” config for PDF exports will add appropriate margins based on the paper size to ensure that no content is lost if the export is printed.
--  A new “Print to Fit” formatting option will automatically apply the ideal formatting for digitally storing and sharing PDF exports.   
-- Several UX enhancements and bug fixes!
